keywords_array: "Simple epithelium","Stratified epithelium","Simple squamous epithelium","Simple cuboidal epithelium","Simple columnar epithelium","Ciliated columnar epithelium","Stratified columnar epithelium","Stratified cuboidal epithelium","Pseudo stratified epithelium","Stratified squamous epithelium","Basement membrane"
keywords_explanation_array: "Membranous tissue composed of a single layer of cells, covering internal surfaces of the body.","Closely packed sheets of epithelial cells arranged in layers over the external surface of the body.","Epithelium composed of one or more flat cells.","Epithelial cells in a single layer of cube-like cells with large, spherical, central nuclei.","Epithelium with single layer of columnar cells.","Epithelium composed of single layer columnar cells with cilia. ","Epithelium composed of single layer columnar cells with cilia. ","Epithelial tissue with multiple layered cuboidal cells.","A single layered epithelium with the nuclei of cells located at different levels. It appears stratified. ","Epithelium that possesses multiple layers of cells.","A thin sheet of fibers below the epithelium."
